titles.title: Providing for a joint session of Congress to receive a message from the President.
Providing for a joint session of Congress to receive a message from the President.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Provides for a joint session of Congress on January 12, 2016, to receive a message from the President.
